price: Warra Nurraa milkiin isaaniif dabarte, isaan sun ishee irraa fageeffamoodha.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
